column4: hey guys, i just updated to the latest ubuntu version. How do i get rid of this horrible horrible new interface?
whats the difference between gnome hsell and gnome fallback?
Gnome-Shell is Gnome 3 and fallback is version 2
both Unity and Gnome-Shell use other concepts than you are used to. The closest and still maintained desktop-environment to gnome2 is probably XFCE, a more classical desktop.
